In my spare time I like sketching the animals from lab, cool specimens from the beach, or just random creatures that I find particularly charismatic (mostly fishes). I highly recommend checking out #SundayFishSketch on Twitter for some fishy art done by people much more talented than me. 

\
\

```{r, echo = F}
library(magrittr)
library(bsplus)
bs_carousel(id = "fish") %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/reticulatespikefish.jpg")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/tophalf.jpg")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/clownfish and cardinalfish.jpg")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0212181922.jpg")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0302191311.jpg")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0317191105a.jpg")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0422191405.jpg")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0801191951.jpg")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0801191952.jpg")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0801191954.jpg")) 
```
